title: Wallet developer offers ‘on-chain bounty’ daring hackers to take $430K BTC
description: Zengo Wallet will reveal a wallet address containing up to 10 BTC and will also disclose two out of three security factors used to create it.
author: Tom Blackstone

title: How will Ethereum price react to Bitcoin ETF approval?
description: A potential Bitcoin ETF approval should lift all boats including Ethereum as ETH price eyes 75% upside in the months ahead.
author: Yashu Gola

title: Bitcoin traders see breakout as bulls cling to $44K in ETF countdown
description: BTC price action is due a sea change in the coming days thanks to the spot Bitcoin ETF decision, while U.S. inflation data is also inbound.
author: William Suberg

title: Bitcoin ETFs will solve unit bias psychology, says VanEck adviser
description: Gabor Gurbacs, an adviser at VanEck, highlights the psychology that makes investors feel more satisfied when owning an entire asset rather than just a fraction, particularly with Bitcoin.
author: Ciaran Lyons

title: BlackRock to slash 3% of workforce ahead of Bitcoin ETF deadline: Report
description: BlackRock is reportedly set to break the news to 600 employees in the coming days amid hopes for the approval of its spot Bitcoin ETF application.
author: Ciaran Lyons

title: What are the next steps for the Bitcoin ETF?
description: Final amendments from asset managers seeking regulatory approval for a spot Bitcoin ETF are due on Jan. 8. Analysts expect trading to begin on Jan. 11.
author: Ana Paula Pereira

title: Bitcoin’s first wallet receives $1.17M in surprise transaction
description: Conor Grogan, a director at Coinbase, suggested that the anonymous Bitcoin transfer could be some sort of weird ETF marketing scheme.
author: Amaka Nwaokocha

title: Coinbase acquiring Cyprus-based entity to expand EU derivatives offerings
description: While Coinbase aims to compete in the EU derivatives market, it faces stiff competition from more prominent players like Binance, Bybit, OKX and Deribit.
author: Amaka Nwaokocha

title: Bitcoin ETF approval would be a ‘historic mistake,’ says Better Markets CEO
description: Bloomberg ETF analyst James Seyffart disagreed with the letter, arguing that denying the spot Bitcoin ETF would be a “criminal move.”
author: Ciaran Lyons

title: Price analysis 1/5: BTC, ETH, BNB, SOL, XRP, ADA, AVAX, DOGE, DOT, MATIC
description: Bitcoin is trading just below the $45,000 level as traders await the SEC's final decision on the spot Bitcoin ETF applications.
author: Rakesh Upadhyay

title: SEC moves closer to spot Bitcoin ETF approval with 19b-4 amendment filings
description: As the week draws to a close, 11 spot Bitcoin ETF applicants have submitted 19b-4 amendment forms, with the deadline for the U.S. SEC to approve or deny the product just days away.
author: Turner Wright

title: Why is Bitcoin price down today?
description: Bitcoin price is down today as traders begin to realize profits ahead of the long-awaited spot ETF decision.
author: Kyle White

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.
author: Serge Egon Ostman

title: VanEck pledges 5% of spot Bitcoin ETF profits to core devs after SEC approval
description: As many asset managers are awaiting a decision from the SEC, VanEck said it signed a pledge to donate profits from its spot crypto ETF to Bitcoin core developers through Brink.
author: Turner Wright

title: BTC price centers on $43K as nervous Bitcoin traders await ETF news
description: Bitcoin feels stuck in limbo amid a lack of cues over whether or not a U.S. ETF will get the go-ahead, but BTC price holds higher versus earlier in the week.
author: William Suberg
